data.question: What is the empirical formula of UTSA-74?
At what temperature (K) were the crystallographic data for UTSA-74a collected?
Is the crystal system for UTSA-74 and UTSA-74a the same?
What is the volume (Å3) of the unit cell for UTSA-74⊃CO2?
Does the TG plot of UTSA-74 indicate solvent molecules can be removed by activation at 200 °C?
What is the formula weight of UTSA-74a?
Can the PXRD patterns of UTSA-74 after immersion in water with different pH values indicate its stability?
What is the calculated density (Mg/m3) of UTSA-74?
Is the space group for UTSA-74, UTSA-74a, and UTSA-74⊃CO2 identical?
What is the final R index (ωR2) for UTSA-74?
Does the N2 adsorption isotherm at 77K for UTSA-74a show a fully reversible type-I isotherm?
What is the BET surface area of UTSA-74a?
Is the pore size of UTSA-74a larger than that of Zn-MOF-74?
What is the adsorption capacity of UTSA-74a for C2H2 at ambient temperature and pressure of 100 kPa?
Does UTSA-74a have a higher adsorption capacity for CO2 compared to Zn-MOF-74?
What is the static binding energy (EB) for a single C2H2 adsorption on the Zn site in UTSA-74a?
Is the CO2 binding on the open-Zn in UTSA-74a of a side-on fashion?
What is the isosteric heat of adsorption (Qst) value for CO2 in UTSA-74a?
Does UTSA-74a demonstrate a higher adsorption selectivity for C2H2/CO2 separation compared to HOF-3?
What is the dimensionless breakthrough time (τbreak) for UTSA-74a in the separation of a 50/50 C2H2/CO2 mixture at 298 K?
